name: Nod-Krai Hot Dog
description: Classic convenience food. Put a sausage in some bread, sprinkle on some fried onions, a generous squirt of sauce... and there you go, a delicious, filling Nod-Krai Hot Dog!

suspicious.name: Suspicious Nod-Krai Hot Dog
suspicious.description: Classic convenience food. The sausage is too dry, while the bread is too soft, giving the unpleasant impression of chewing on a sponge... If not for hunger, it would be hard not to throw it away...
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Nod-Krai Hot Dog
normal.description: Classic convenience food. Put a sausage in some bread, sprinkle on some fried onions, a generous squirt of sauce... and there you go, a delicious, filling Nod-Krai Hot Dog!
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Nod-Krai Hot Dog
delicious.description: Classic convenience food. Freshly cooked sausage paired with freshly baked bread. With each bite, the irresistible aroma of fat fills the palate. It's gone in a few quick bites, leaving you craving another.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
